reference.title: APIs
reference.shortdesc: The chapters in this part describe all available APIs of . Also, you can view a sample program exploiting a selection of these APIs.

section.title: Supported cryptographic operations
section.p: For each type of cryptographic primitive, certain APIs with different key types and lengths and operation modes are supported.
